statements: SELECT * FROM audio_tracks WHERE track_id = 1;

SELECT track_id, track_name, album_id FROM audio_tracks WHERE artist_id = 5 ORDER BY track_name DESC;
SELECT artist_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tracks FROM audio_tracks GROUP BY artist_id;
SELECT * FROM audio_tracks WHERE track_duration BETWEEN 200 AND 300 ORDER BY artist_id ASC, track_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_id, artist_name FROM artists WHERE artist_genre='Rock';
SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE artist_id=1 ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(album_id) AS total_albums FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name;

SELECT artist_name, album_title FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id;
SELECT track_id, track_title, artist_id, album_id FROM audio_tracks WHERE track_id < 10 ORDER BY track_id DESC;

SELECT album_name, release_year FROM albums ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT track_name, track_duration FROM tracks WHERE track_duration > '00:03:30' ORDER BY track_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre, albums.album_name FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id;

SELECT tracks.track_name, artists.artist_name FROM tracks JOIN track_artists ON tracks.track_id = track_artists.track_id JOIN artists ON track_artists.artist_id = artists.artist_id ORDER BY tracks.track_name DESC;

SELECT track_name, duration FROM audio_tracks

SELECT track_name, duration FROM audio_tracks WHERE duration > 3.00;

SELECT album_name, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT track_name, artist_name, album_name FROM audio_tracks JOIN artists ON audio_tracks.artist_id = artists.artist_id JOIN track_albums ON audio_tracks.track_id = track_albums.track_id JOIN albums ON track_albums.album_id = albums.album_id WHERE duration < 4.00;
